mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from users order by user_win desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}

select user_id, rank,user_tear tear,user_name name,user_money money,user_win win,user_lose lose , equ_character, equ_background from (select DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY user_win DESC) rank ,rownum rn, tt.* from (select eq.user_id,user_tear,user_name,user_money,user_win,user_lose, equ_character, equ_background from users u FULL OUTER JOIN equipment eq ON u.user_id = eq.user_id order by user_win desc) tt) WHERE rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}

select rank,user_name name,user_win win,user_lose lose from (select DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY user_win DESC) rank ,rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from users order by user_win desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}

select user_id, rank,user_tear tear,user_name name,user_money money,user_win win,user_lose lose , equ_character, equ_background from (select DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY user_money DESC) rank ,rownum rn, tt.* from (select eq.user_id,user_tear,user_name,user_money,user_win,user_lose, equ_character, equ_background from users u FULL OUTER JOIN equipment eq ON u.user_id = eq.user_id order by user_money desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
